# AVSEsxiSyslog

Contains logs generated by ESXi hosts, other than firewall and IDS/IPS entries.


## Table attributes

|Attribute|Value|
|---|---|
|**Resource types**|microsoft.avs/privateclouds|
|**Categories**|-|
|**Solutions**| LogManagement|
|**Basic log**|Yes|
|**Ingestion-time transformation**|Yes|
|**Sample Queries**|-|
